Every Sanbun story is the same.
I can just imagine sanbun being a 80 lb skeleton hunched up in his room drawing with one hand this repulsive garbage and the other hopeless wrapped around his twinkle dick

@femdom there is a one-shot that was released a few months back that was definitely a vanilla story. Don't remember what magazine it was released it. Also, the mom in it bears a striking resemblance to Chain Sumeragi from Blood Blockade Battlefront.

You know, I have been a long time fan of this fucker. 
And I pray, God knows I do, to have him work ONCE to do a vanilla story. 

I love his art style and settings so much, but the executions are awful. 
What's worse, he doesn't do commissions. 

Oh Lord, why.
Honestly is one of Sanbun's less fucked up pieces. A good fap all around
